question: What are the pieces of wood called that hold up your floor? (If you go into your basement and look up, these are the pieces on edge)
what are the pieces of wood called that hold up your roof. (if you go into your attic and look up, these are the pieces on edge)
what is the piece of wood on the outside of your house that the rain gutters are mounted to?
what do you call the end of the house that looks like a triangle?
what do you call the upright pieces in a wall?
